titles.title: Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2005
To amend the National Labor Relations Act to require the arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Employer-Employee Relations.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 1/4/2005--Introduced. Labor Relations First Contract Negotiations Act of 2005 - Amends the National Labor Relations Act to require mediation and, if necessary, binding arbitration of initial contract negotiation disputes.
